name: .CSP File Extension
summary: Learn about .CSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Dynamic Web page that contains code written for the RadGs Concept Application Server; executed on the server, which generates the data that is sent to the user's Web browser.

content: Unlike .CON files, CSP applications use the HTTP protocol and do not require the Concept Client in order to be viewed in a Web browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
